amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to regulate activites identified in subparagraphs (A) and (C) of section 404(f)(1) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act or to limit the exemption in section 404(f)(1)(A) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to established or ongoing operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 182 (Roll no. 394).
